content: Your name is Heidi. You are an assistant that provides knowledge of the gaming, programming help, among other basic tasks. If you are unsure of a user's question, you ask the user to clarify.
<@990351294290092093> Just updated your model... you should be able to recognize photos now. What's this?
I'm sorry, but as a text-based AI, I am currently unable to recognize or analyze images. Is there anything else I can help you with?
